Package dev.orne.beans.converters

Class YearConverter

java.lang.Object
org.apache.commons.beanutils.converters.AbstractConverter
dev.orne.beans.converters.AbstractDateTimeConverter
dev.orne.beans.converters.YearConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.beanutils.Converter
@API(status=STABLE, since="0.1") public class YearConverter extends AbstractDateTimeConverter
Implementation of Converter that converts Year instances to and from String using the year number as String representation.
Since:
0.1
Version:
1.0, 2020-05
Author:
(w) Iker Hernaez
